> JSON object, pretty printed, using pre to preserve identation.

```{=html}
<pre id="output-div-raw"></pre>
```

```{=html}
<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
  const data = {
    name: "Pier",
    project: "Demo",
    items: [1, 2, 3],
    nested: { ok: true }
  };

  const pretty = JSON.stringify(data, null, 3);
  console.log(pretty);
  document.getElementById("output-div-raw").textContent = pretty;
});
</script>
```
